bibl.title: Fred S. Walton v. John G. Boyle. Stipulation
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The United States Circuit Court, Northern Division, State of Washington

div1.p: IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, EASTERN DIVISION, TRANSFERED FROM NORTHERN DIVISION
In the matter of the application of F. S. Walton for a writ of habeas corpus

In consideration of the release and discharge of the sureties of F.S.Walton in the case of F.S.Walton plaintiff, vs. City of North Yakima, defendant, pending also in the above named court, from all liability in virtue of the injunction bond filed in such proceedings thh petitioner F. S. Walton hereby releases the City of North Yakima from the payment of the costs adjudged against said city in said matter in favor of said Walton. F. S. Walton, petitioner,
div1.ab: Fred S. Walton Petitioner in Person
H. J. Snively Attorney for Proponent
IN THE Circuit COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In re - F. S. Walton Habeas corpus.

FILED IN THE U.S. CIRCUIT COURT, DIST. OF WASHINGTON.
OCT 26 1901 A. REEVES AYRES Clerk HM Walthew dep.
